problem.title: The problem
problem.description: Your team spends hours every week on repetitive tasks. Data lives in disconnected systems that don't talk to each other. Manual processes are slow, error-prone, and don't scale. You're hiring to handle volume, not complexity.

solution.title: Our approach
solution.description: We map your workflows, identify automation opportunities, and build connected systems. Repetitive tasks get automated. Data flows between systems automatically. AI assists where appropriate. Your team focuses on work that requires human judgment.

timeline.title: Timeline & expectations
timeline.description: Simple automations: 1-2 weeks. Complex workflows: 4-8 weeks. Multi-system integrations: 6-12 weeks. ROI is often immediate—automations pay for themselves quickly through time savings.

faq.question: What can and can't be automated?
faq.answer: Rule-based, repetitive tasks automate well. Creative decisions, complex negotiations, and edge cases need humans. We help identify what should and shouldn't be automated.

faq.question: What tools do you work with?
faq.answer: Most modern business tools have APIs. Common: Zapier, Make, n8n, custom APIs, Slack, CRMs, email systems, spreadsheets, databases. We assess your specific stack.

faq.question: What if something breaks?
faq.answer: All automations include error handling and alerting. You'll know immediately if something fails. We build for reliability, not just function.

faq.question: How do you handle AI?
faq.answer: AI is a tool, not a magic solution. We use it where appropriate—text generation, classification, summarization—with proper oversight and fallbacks.
